name: Space-Game
description:
Please note, that my game DOES have audio, but for a reason i can't seem to figure out, it doesn't load in the WebGL build. You can still hear it in the downloadable game.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You're a space plumber and a space turtle kidnapped your princess! 
You will need to get "stronger to-get-her" back!
Play the minigames to get stronger, so you can take on the boss!

Controls

Fly around with with WASD or the arrow keys.
Shoot with the Spacebar or toggle shooting with E. 

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in 1 week!
